meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7521.

td.p: Meghan Treptow, an artist from Chicago, Illinois
Matt Cohen, an electrical engineer from Weehawken, New Jersey
Alan Lin, a software engineer from Santa Barbara, California (whose 5-day cash winnings total $108,800)

tr.td: PRESIDENTIAL MUSIC?
SNEAKER BRANDS
THE BOOK OF VERBS
BILLS, BILLS, BILLS
SIGNS OF THE ZODIAC
IT'S HYPHENATED
